article: a top shiite leader said thursday he supports federalism and the endorsement of militias in the country 's constitution , prompting sunni leaders to warn the stance could postpone completion of the key document that is due next week .
abstract: shiite leader says he supports federalism ; sunni leaders warn stance could delay constitution
